reviewText:
Early Access Review

The randomization make every walkthrough uniq.
I managed to beat the end boss on easy, but on medium I need more practice... :-)
A lot of Items, enemies, maps, decisions...
The controller support its great and makes it for me more enjoyable.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

A cute pixel space(ish) platformer. Those you want to try and try to get the hi-scores and defeat bosses!"


Introduction
I like platformer games. Reminds me when I was a child and I use to play those retro 8 bits. This is not just a jump and gets the item game. You need to think what to do and be quick. Before starting you can choose the character
date: weapon and special abilities and skills
recommended: that could make a difference while playing. Did I say be quick? Enemies are not the classic turtles
hoursPlayed: you have to think what to do and use strategy to avoid the enemies.\nThe graphics are really cool
helpfulPercent: nothing harsh for the eyes and very space(ish) like. Also
votesHelpful:
I liked the music but turns a little bit repetitive when you are playing.



Gameplay
You can pick a weapon of your choice and several skills and abilities. Think well
votesTotal: and I suggest you to try several times the perfect combination. Defeat the enemies in the Spacestation
votesFunny: with randomly generated screens. Some enemies are hidden
commentsCount: there is an ability to avoid that but maybe you want to try something else better like a shield. Or extra defense
column16: or being faster. This is the best of the game
column17: also as I said before you have to act quick.\nYou will pass the next screen once you killed all enemies. Beware of not shooting them so close
column18: or you will receive damage. Who said this game was easy? Ah
column19: you can pick the "hard" way too at the beginning of the game.\nAlso
column20: you can try the challenges with some predetermined settings like extra lives but less shield
column21:
etc.


Pros
+ Good pixel retro style
+Chance of creating your own character
+Good difficulty
+ Random levels
+ Easy commands
+Double and wall jump
+ Challenge mode

Cons
- Music turns a little bit repetitive
- Sometimes you enter to a very similar room (not always)
- Levels turn to be repetitive if you play a lot.

Final Thoughts
I find this game very enjoyable. Maybe I'd add more levels
column22:
sometimes some levels seem to be similar to others. That happens when you play a lot. The first boss is quite complicated. Adding a hidden place would be great. I know the game is in early access and there are plans to add extras. Different music or more variety also would be a pro.

Rating:7/10

This review was submitted for Elite Giveaways
column23: check us out for more reviews ranging from Indie games to AAA games.\n\nGame key provided by Wehrmann Studios."

It's a quite interesting game, there are lot of things going on. Fun to play and lots of unlocks!
Hope there will be more enemies and different rooms to make it even more diversified.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Funny game! Quite difficult but still fun! Need some more time to get to know each item.
Also to know what each enemy does.
Wish for more different rooms and background images! Also background stories would be nice!
Looking forward for more updates and patches!
